title: (x) Lined Bauhaus-style sans on Glam Rock album cover- Pump Triline {Jan E}
content:
Hi,

I'm looking to identify the "Glam Rock" typeface.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307123546im_/http:/typophile.com/files/31QBGADT9CL_5951._SS500_.jpg)

Thank you.
author: nevub

comments.content:
It looks like a rounded version of a typeface called Prisma that was introduced in the 1920s. Visit my blog, [http://blackswaniw.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307123546/http:/blackswaniw.wordpress.com/), where I have posted a copy of a sample page and information about the source.

mgk
mgk - Prisma [has been digitized](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307123546/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32882) and will be released by Lineto.
